summary: Ever felt underpowered as a mage?
descriptionHtml:
Introduction:

Ever felt a little underpowered as the Arch mage of Skyrim? Well, despair no longer. this single item will turn you from petty spell caster into Super Mage. Throw fireballs, fly (can be achieved by jumping of cliffs), and shoot lasers from your eyes at enemies (mod do not include lasers).

Notes:

version2 adds:
-Retextured Arch mage Boots
-Red cape like thing on the back
-female version

Mod does not change anything about the Arch mages robe,except for the Texture.
Originally made this mod for a friend, but uploaded it for fun here. Hope you enjoy it :)

If you have any requests please PM me, and i will look into it.

Installation:

Simply extract the .rar into your skyrim folder.
In steam this will be located something along these lines:
C:\\xxxx\\steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

Uninstallation:

Just remove the files added by the mod.
author: Awesomeviking
